meanings.definition: A type of particle accelerator used in physics research.
meanings.sent1: Scientists at the lab were excited to test the new bevatrons.
meanings.sent2: The bevatrons at the facility helped study subatomic particles.
meanings.sent3: The bevatrons decided to throw a party to celebrate their latest experiment.
meanings.sent4: The bevatrons hummed with energy as they propelled particles forward.
meanings.sent5: The bevatrons whirred loudly, filling the lab with a sense of discovery.
